name: quotes-api
description: The QuotesAPI is a free to use Quote Generator built with Node.js that provides access to a diverse collection of over 100 inspiration quotes from various backgrounds ranging from Motivational, Wisdom, Love and more. The quotes are categorized, having authors and a brief description with each having a unique id and all the options can be used to query the api. Most of the quotes were generated randomly from ChatGPT.
author: Imam Dahir Dan-Azumi
